name: TypeRacer Flat Blue (+ad removal)
description: A flat TypeRacer style â†’ you'll never race the same again! New, easier to read font, more subtle error indicator in order to not distract you, fancy logo, less flashing. Inspired by Material and Flat design, with an emphasis on adding bright colors and not losing features, you can stop your search for the best TypeRacer theme ever. Ads are also removed, but I still recommend you sign up for TypeRacer premium, it's totally worth it for the avatars and profiles.
additional_info:
Updated February 2016 for the ads, which seem targeted at logged in users who are not paying for premium.

By all means I recommend premium, but the ads are ugly and unnecessary. It's a shame TypeRacer loves to riddle the site with four or five ads at any given time. It's a bummer for an otherwise wonderful site.
